SOF_1.description: Please Confirm no Losses or Circumstances have been Discovered at the Date of Automation?

SOF_2.description: The policyholder is audited annually by an external Auditor and any recommendations made around control improvements are implemented within an agreed time frame and any variances/exceptions investigated by Senior Management

SOF_3.description: All funds transfers are segregated so that no one individual can complete any transaction from commencement to completion without referral to others.

SOF_4.description: When recruiting or promoting persons to positions of financial responsibility, background checks are conducted to ensure suitability for the position and such records are maintained on file.

SOF_5.description: All Suppliers / Contractors / Sub-Contractors are vetted and assessed for suitability prior to awarding the tender for services and all such records maintained are authorized by at least 2 (two) signatories.

SOF_6.description: All expense or invoice requisitions require full supporting documentation prior to the payment being authorized.

SOF_7.description: Access to the insureds computer systems and networks are protected by Firewall and Anti-Virus Software which is updated regularly, including password protection with individual user log-on details required to be changed once at least every 90 days.

SOF_8.description: All premises are locked and alarmed outside of working hours

SOF_9.description: All premises containing stock, inventory, securities or precious metals are audited at least annually and stock records maintained.

SOF_10.description: All cash in hand or petty cash is reconciled daily and stored in a locked safe.

SOF_11.description: All requests purporting to come from Vendors, Suppliers or Customers, including the transfer of funds or to change details stored on file, are authenticated with a known contact at the Vendor, Supplier or Customer via a Phone Call and NOT using the details provided on such request.

SOF_12.description: The policyholder has had no claims of the type that would be covered under this policy in the last 5 years. If there have been no claims, please answer “yes”. If there has been a claim, please answer “no” and provide more details around the circumstances of the loss and remedial actions taken by the company

SOF_13.description: Staff are not able to access the network via public WiFi or hotspots. If staff cannot access the network via public WiFi/Hotspots, please answer "Yes". If staff can access the network via public WiFi/hotspots, please answer "No" and provide more details around the network security of insured.

SOF_14.description: Two factor authentication is required to access the network.

SOF_15.description: In roles of financial responsibility, all segregated duties and financial controls are being applied the same as before workers were remotely working.

SOF_16.description: Awareness around increased Social Engineering activity is being communicated across the remote workforce.

SOF_17.description: All premises are secured to the same level of physical security

errorMessage.before: Sign date cannot be after start date

firmOrderUpload.description: I agree that signed Firm Order document is uploaded
